ci_support_linux_64_channel_sourcesconda:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge,conda-forge/label/python_rc
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
gsl:
- '2.7'
libblas:
- 3.9.* *netlib
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.14.* *_cp314
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - python
  - channel_sources

about.summary: Python binding to chooch, a program for calculating anomalous scattering factors from X-ray fluorescence spectra

Python binding to chooch, a program for calculating anomalous scattering factors from X-ray fluorescence spectra

name: pychooch

about.summary: Python binding to chooch, a program for calculating anomalous scattering factors from X-ray fluorescence spectra
Python binding to chooch, a program for calculating anomalous scattering factors from X-ray fluorescence spectra

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: pychooch
  version: 5.0.9

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/mxcube/pychooch/archive/refs/tags/${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 3dfb79095f44d7215427df5fc084551e6cf8928d8e844fc2accbd255b8b3c735

build:
  number: 4
  skip: win
  script: ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  build:
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
    - cmake
    - make
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools
    - gsl
    - libblas
    - plplot
  run:
    - python

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - PyChooch
      pip_check: true
  - files:
      source:
        - test_pychooch.py
        - CHOOCH_TEST.raw
    script:
      - python test_pychooch.py CHOOCH_TEST.raw

about:
  summary: Python binding to chooch, a program for calculating anomalous scattering factors from X-ray fluorescence spectra
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  license_file: LICENSE
  homepage: https://github.com/mxcube/pychooch
  repository: https://github.com/mxcube/pychooch

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - beenje
